Name: Fallen Threats
About the game: Fallen Threats is a roguelike with some RPG elements, where you have to defeat the final boss to complete the game, for this you have to go through levels, each time hardest than the other, explore a randomly generated dungeon pick up loot, level up, fight enemies and bosses, buy new swords, go deeper and use your abilities. How long will you survive? Explore a random dungeon generated, pick up loot, level up, fight enemies and bosses, buy new swords, go deeper and use your abilities. Will you survive at the end?.
